LanguageData.Pirate_Eyepatch.label: 海盗眼罩
LanguageData.Pirate_Eyepatch.description: An eyepatch to cover an eye. Makes you look like a real pirate, yarr har!
LanguageData.Apparel_Scarf.label: 围巾
LanguageData.Apparel_Scarf.description: A scarf is a long piece of fabric wrapped around the neck. It is commonly used in cold regions as it provides protection from cold weather.
LanguageData.BanditMask.label: 强盗面罩
LanguageData.BanditMask.description: A simple hankerkief mask. Commonly worn by bandits.
LanguageData.Apparello_Shadess.label: 太阳镜
LanguageData.Apparello_Shadess.description: A pair of stylish eye shades favoured for protection from the sun. The wearer will never get caught with the excuse "the sun was shining in my eyes!"
LanguageData.Apparello_Brimsk.label: 滑雪面罩
LanguageData.Apparello_Brimsk.description: A military grade mask with skiing goggles attached, with a slightly stylized design. It is known for its heavy impact resistance.
LanguageData.Marine_BattleMask.label: 陆战队面罩
LanguageData.Marine_BattleMask.description: A mask with a of pair of marine special forces military grade goggles, slightly stylized design. It is known for having heavy impact resistance.
LanguageData.Apparello_Visoor.label: 航天飞行面罩
LanguageData.Apparello_Visoor.description: A pair of shuttle pilot's visors. It can be used to fulfill your usual piloting needs like calling in "Houston; mayday mayday - landing struts are jammed, I repeat landing struts are jammed. Copy? Roger Wilco. Starfox One out."
